message: Please enter your personal details below.

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME}, Your {TRADE_TYPE} registration with application reference number {APPLICATION_NUMBER} is approved. You are now a licensed {TRADE_TYPE}. You can login to the portal {PORTAL_LINK} using your registered mobile number to do eDCR scrutiny and apply for building permit.

EGOVS

Mail subject - OBPS {TRADE_TYPE} registration _Approved

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME},
Your {TRADE_TYPE} registration with application reference number {APPLICATION_NUMBER} is approved. You are now a licensed {TRADE_TYPE}. You can login to the portal URL using your registered mobile number {MOBILE_NUMBER} to do eDCR scrutiny and apply for building permit.
Portal URL - {PORTAL_LINK}
Thanks & Regards
CCC
{ULB}

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME}, Your Application for {TRADE_TYPE} registration is created with application number {APPLICATION_NUMBER}. You will be notified to pay the application fee shortly.

EGOVS

Mail subject - OBPS {TRADE_TYPE} registration _Initiated

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME},
Your application for {TRADE_TYPE} registration is created with application number {APPLICATION_NUMBER}.You can login to the portal using your registered mobile number {MOBILE_NUMBER} to check the status of the application.
Portal URL - {PORTAL_LINK}
Thanks & Regards
CCC
{ULB}

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME}, Document verification is completed for your {TRADE_TYPE} registration application {APPLICATION_NUMBER}.The application is under scrutiny and you will be notified for further updates.

EGOVS

Mail subject - OBPS {TRADE_TYPE} registration _Under scrutiny

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME},
Document verification is completed for your {TRADE_TYPE} registration application {APPLICATION_NUMBER}.The application is under scrutiny and you will be notified for further updates. You can also check the current status of the application by logging in to the portal and navigating to my applications page.
Portal URL - {PORTAL_LINK}
Thanks & Regards
CCC
{ULB}

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME}, Application fee is received for your {TRADE_TYPE} application {APPLICATION_NUMBER} and will be processed for Document verification shortly.Download receipt at {RECEIPT_DOWNLOAD_LINK}

EGOVS

Mail subject - OBPS {TRADE_TYPE} registration _Pending Document verification

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME},
Application fee is received for your {TRADE_TYPE} registration application {APPLICATION_NUMBER} and will be processed for Document verification shortly.You can also check the current status of the application by logging in to the portal and navigating to my applications page.
Portal URL - {PORTAL_LINK}
{RECEIPT_DOWNLOAD_LINK}
Thanks & Regards
CCC
{ULB}

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME}, Please pay the application fee of Rs.{AMOUNT_TO_BE_PAID}/- for {TRADE_TYPE} registration with application reference {APPLICATION_NUMBER}.Applicaiton will be processed after making the payment.Pay application fee at {PAYMENT_LINK}

EGOVS

Mail subject - OBPS {TRADE_TYPE} registration _Pending fee payment

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME},
Your application for {TRADE_TYPE} registration is created with application number {APPLICATION_NUMBER}.Application fee has to be paid to process this application further. Click here URL to pay Rs.{AMOUNT_TO_BE_PAID}/- or You can login to the portal to pay the application fee.
Portal URL - {PORTAL_LINK}
Thanks & Regards
CCC
{ULB}

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME}, Your Application for {TRADE_TYPE} registration {APPLICATION_NUMBER} is rejected. You can login to the portal and check the reason for rejection.

EGOVS

Mail subject - OBPS {TRADE_TYPE} registration _Rejected

Dear {STAKEHOLDER_NAME},
Your Application for {TRADE_TYPE} registration {APPLICATION_NUMBER} is rejected. You can login to the portal and check the reason for rejection.
Portal URL - {PORTAL_LINK}
Thanks & Regards
CCC
{ULB}
